amendment.description: An amendment numbered 43 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section at the end of the bill Prohibition on Raising Energy Prices which will not increase the average price of energy for American consumers.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought prohibit the bill from taking effect until the Secretary of Energy, in consultation with other Federal agencies, certifies that H.R. 21 will not result in an increase to the average price of energy for Americans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Plaskett amendment (A065) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 221 (Roll no. 86).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A065) offered by Ms. Plaskett.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Plaskett amendment (A065) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 221 (Roll no. 86).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
